string-array.name: tutorial_hints
string-array.item: Welcome to the Tutorial ! You will learn here how to survive in deadly dungeons.\n\nFirst, learn how to move: each turn, your hero rolls 2 dice for his movement, then the reachable tiles are enlightened in green. Tap on the door to open it and move on to the next room.

This goblin looks angry, let\'s get rid of him.\n\nA red tile will appear under any monster which is within your attack range. Then you can tap on it to attack it. For each sword you get on the dice when attacking, the target has to roll a shield or lose one health point.

Good work ! You just made your first frag !\n\nMonsters are not the only threat though; you will also encounter traps. Each turn, your hero will try to detect the traps around him, depending on his number of spirit points, so try not to rush if you want to stay safe ! You can now move on to the next room.

There is a treasure chest here !\nThe treasure\'s tile is enlightened in blue if you can reach it and open it during your hero\'s turn. Searching for treasures will end your current turn. Move on to the last room when the treasure chest is empty.

You can now leave this quest by reaching the exit stairs, but before, be sure to remember these last points:\n- You can only exit the dungeon if no monster are visible.\n- Your spells can only be used once a quest, so keep them for the most dangerous monster !

resources.string:
This will be your final test before you set forth.

Be sure to use all the skills that you have been taught. You must attempt to find your way out.

Several monsters have been placed in the Maze. They will try to stop you, so take care...
Your first quest is a success !\n\nYou are now ready to plan more dangerous adventures.

You have learnt well, my friend. Now has come the time of your first trial.

You have to travel east and enter the catacombs of Verag, a foul gargoyle.

The trial is not easy and some of you will not return. This is your first step on the road to becoming a hero... tread carefully, my friend.
Congratulations, but Verag was just the first of many dangerous foes you will encounter...

Prince Magnus has ordered that the Orc Warlord Ulag, who was responsible for the murder of his son, should be sought out and killed.\n\nWhoever kills Ulag will be rewarded with 100 gold coins. Any treasure found in the stronghold may also be kept.
Well, you deserve these 100 gold coins. But beware, the orcs may want to revenge...

Three Treasure chests have been stolen whilst being taken to the Emperor.

 A reward of 200 gold coins has been offered to anyone who can return the chests and ALL the gold.

The thieves are known to be a band of Orcs hiding in the Black Mountains. They are led by Gulthor, a powerful Ogre.
Only 200 gold coins... you should have kept the chests !

The foul offspring of Ulag, Grak, has sworn revenge on those who killed his father.

Although it has taken his several weeks, he has finally tracked you down and captured you in an ambush. Now you are held prisoner in his dungeons while he racks his brains to devise a terrible punishment for you.

While the guard sleeps, however, you manage to pick the lock of your cell with an old rat bone... You must escape now !
You have finally defeated the orcs and you are safe and free... for now !

The personal Wizard of the Emperor, Karlen, has disappeared.

The Emperor fears that either he has been murdered or has succumbed to the lures of Chaos Magic. You are to find out what has happened to Karlen and, if he is alive, bring him to safety.

You will be paid 100 gold coins upon returning. Good luck !
Whilst working on a Chaos Spell, Karlen has been turned into an evil wizard. Hopefully he is now defeated and will not be a threat to the kingdom anymore.

A guide has led you into a dungeon that is rumoured to hold a great secret. He has led you down many dark corridors and finally you find yourself in a room with three doors.

Suddenly the guide puts out his torch and in the darkness you hear him laugh.
"Farewell my Heroes, he sneers as he makes his escape.

You realize to your horror that it is a trap! You must escape or perish in this dark forgotten hole.
Well, finally safe... Let\'s find this traitor !

The Witch Lord has been awaken. He will pose a most serious threat to the Emperor in the coming war.

The Witch Lord must be destroyed before he can bring his army of Undead to attack the forces of the Emperor. You must first find the Spirit Blade, for only this ancient weapon can harm him.

The Spirit Blade was forged by the Dwarves of the World Edge Mountains and cooled in the Elven fountain of Lebin. The sword now lies in an ancient ruined temple and you must recover it...
Good job, let\'s now destroy the Witch Lord ! The Spirit Blade may help...

Now that you have found the Spirit Blade, you must go to Barak Tor and defeat the Witch Lord.

The Emperor has ridden forth to meet the Eastern Orcs at Black Fire Pass. If you fail, the Witch Lord will lead his army of Undead and attack the forces of the Emperor from the rear.

Then nothing will remain to prevent the Forces of Chaos overrunning the lands...
Victory ! The forces of Chaos are defeated !
